analysis.Summary: SectionFeatures.vue defines a reusable Vue component that renders a “How to buy”/features section on a landing page. It displays a localized title and a list of feature cards (icon, title, description) driven by i18n message data passed in via props.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as a modular section within the landing page to showcase a set of features or steps, using translation data provided by the parent.

Components.name: SectionFeatures
Components.description: Main Vue component that uses the Composition API and vue-i18n to render a section with a heading and a dynamic list of features.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue Composition API helper to declare and validate the `content` prop of type Object, required.

parameters.name: { content }
parameters.description: Contains localization messages including `title` and `features` array.

Functions.name: useI18n
Functions.description: Hook from vue-i18n returning translation functions configured with incoming messages.

returns.name: t
returns.description: Translate a single string key, used here for the section title.

returns.name: tm
returns.description: Translate message arrays or access nested translation data, used here to retrieve the array of `features`.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent landing page component and rendered with `<SectionFeatures :content="landingContent"/>`, where `landingContent` is an object containing localized strings under `title` and `features`.
Notes: The root `<section>` has id `howtobuy`, which may not semantically match “features”.
The `<style lang="scss">` block is empty—styling is entirely via utility classes.
Feature items rely on `feature.title` as a unique key; ensure titles are unique in provided data.
